6// ProvokingVertexHelper.h:
7// Manages re-writing index buffers when provoking vertex support is needed.
8// Handles points, lines, triangles, line strips, and triangle strips.
9// Line loops, and triangle fans should be pre-processed.
10//
11#ifndef PrimitiveRestartHelper_h
12#define PrimitiveRestartHelper_h
13
14#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
15#include "libANGLE/renderer/ContextImpl.h"
16#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/DisplayMtl.h"
17#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_buffer_pool.h"
18#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_command_buffer.h"
19#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_state_cache.h"
20namespace rx
21{
22class ContextMtl;
23
24class ProvokingVertexHelper : public mtl::ProvokingVertexCacheSpecializeShaderFactory
25{
26public:
27 ProvokingVertexHelper(ContextMtl * context, mtl::CommandQueue * commandQueue, DisplayMtl *display);
28 mtl::BufferRef preconditionIndexBuffer(ContextMtl * context,
29 mtl::BufferRef indexBuffer,
30 size_t indexCount,
31 size_t indexOffset,
32 bool primitiveRestartEnabled,
33 gl::PrimitiveMode primitiveMode,
34 gl::DrawElementsType elementsType,
35 size_t & outIndexcount,
36 gl::PrimitiveMode & outPrimitiveMode);
37 void commitPreconditionCommandBuffer(ContextMtl * context);
38 void ensureCommandBufferReady();
39 void onDestroy(ContextMtl * context);
40private:
41 id<MTLLibrary> mProvokingVertexLibrary;
42 mtl::CommandBuffer mCommandBuffer;
43 mtl::BufferPool mIndexBuffers;
44 mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineCache mPipelineCache;
45 mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc mCachedDesc;
46 mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder mCurrentEncoder;
47
48 mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder * getComputeCommandEncoder();
49 //Program cache
50 virtual angle::Result getSpecializedShader(rx::mtl::Context *context,
51 gl::ShaderType shaderType,
52 const mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc,
53 id<MTLFunction> *shaderOut) override;
54 //Private command buffer
55 virtual bool hasSpecializedShader(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
56 const mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc) override;
57
58 void prepareCommandEncoderForDescriptor(ContextMtl * context, mtl::ComputeCommandEncoder * encoder, mtl::ProvokingVertexComputePipelineDesc desc);
59};
60} // namespace rx
61#endif /* PrimitiveRestartHelper_h */
62
